title: 2 Chainz Interview and More
itunes:title: 2 Chainz Interview and More
description:
Friday 7/14 - Today on the show we had 2 Chainz stop by and promote his new album, regretting not going to the White House when Obama was there and more. Also, after Tyler the Creator allegedly came out the closet because of a verse he said on a song, Charlamagne wanted to school our listeners on how their were other artist such as Biggie Smalls who had way worse lyrics about being gay. So for a Freaky Friday topic we opened up the phone lines for our listeners to choose which line from different artist was the freakiest gay verse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 7/14 - Today on the show we had 2 Chainz stop by and promote his new album, regretting not going to the White House when Obama was there and more. Also, after Tyler the Creator allegedly came out the closet because of a verse he said on a song, Charlamagne wanted to school our listeners on how their were other artist such as Biggie Smalls who had way worse lyrics about being gay. So for a Freaky Friday topic we opened up the phone lines for our listeners to choose which line from different artist was the freakiest gay verse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
